Class CcddJTableHandler.PageWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • CCDD.CcddJTableHandler.PageWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.print.Printable

    CcddJTableHandler

    private class CcddJTableHandler.PageWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.print.Printable
    Printable wrapper class. This allows multiple printable objects to be output for the same print job
